import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function CreateJobForm() { const [ jobSuccess, setJobSuccess ] = useState(''); const [ jobFailed, setJobFailed ] = useState(''); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { title: '', description: '', min_salary: '', max_salary: '', company_name: '', job_location: '', last_date_to_submit: '', contact_email: '', contact_num: '', starting_date: '', technologies: [] }, onSubmit: (values, {resetForm}) => { (async () => { try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/job/create', values); resetForm({}) setJobSuccess('Congratulations!! Your job has been added! :D '); document.body.scrollTop = 0; // For Safari document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0; } catch (error) { setJobFailed( 'Something went wrong! Please check if you have filled everything currently or let me know your issue at devarifhossain@gmail.com' ); } })(); } }); return (
{jobSuccess && (
)} {jobFailed && (
)}
